page.title: 12Bus Services
page.content: As part of our project we looked at some of the{transport}that was available in our grid.We decided that it would be sensible to ring{Eastern {National}to find out exactly which services were available. These were 120---Harwich Town service 103,104---Colchester 106,126---Clacton 80---Small town,Colchester When we asked people if there were enough services they said no,but we thought that the buses were not often very full,so it would cost too much to lay on extra ones. It seemed to us when we surveyed,that except for the rush-hour,the people who made most use of the buses,were the young and the elderly. We also thought that there should be more garages,or at least one that stayed open past 8-o-clock.
